data.Label: Sex of Respondent
data.Question: Sex of Respondent

data.Label: General Health
data.Question: Would you say that in general your health is

data.Label: Number of Days Physical Health Not Good
data.Question: Now thinking about your physical health, which includes physical illness and injury, for how many days during the past 30 days was your physical health not good?

data.Label: Number of Days Mental Health Not Good
data.Question: Now thinking about your mental health, which includes stress, depression, and problems with emotions, for how many days during the past 30 days was your mental health not good?

data.Label: Poor Physical or Mental Health
data.Question: During the past 30 days, for about how many days did poor physical or mental health keep you from doing your usual activities, such as self-care, work, or recreation?

data.Label: Have any health care coverage
data.Question: Do you have any kind of health care coverage, including health insurance, prepaid plans such as HMOs, or government plans such as Medicare, or Indian Health Service?

data.Label: Multiple Health Care Professionals
data.Question: Do you have one person you think of as your personal doctor or health care provider?  (If  ́No ́ ask  ́Is there more than one or is there no person who you think of as your personal doctor or health care provider? ́.)

data.Label: Could Not See Doctor Because of Cost
data.Question: Was there a time in the past 12 months when you needed to see a doctor but could not because of cost?

data.Label: Length of time since last routine checkup
data.Question: About how long has it been since you last visited a doctor for a routine checkup?   [A routine checkup is a general physical exam, not an exam for a specific injury, illness, or condition.]

data.Label: Ever Told Blood Pressure High
data.Question: Have you ever been told by a doctor, nurse or other health professional that you have high blood pressure?  (If  ́Yes ́ and respondent is female, ask  ́Was this only when you were pregnant? ́.)

data.Label: Currently Taking Blood Pressure Medication
data.Question: Are you currently taking medicine for your high blood pressure?

data.Label: How Long since Cholesterol Checked
data.Question_Prologue: Blood cholesterol is a fatty substance found in the blood.
data.Question: About how long has it been since you last had your blood cholesterol checked?

data.Label: Ever Told Blood Cholesterol High
data.Question: Have you ever been told by a doctor, nurse or other health professional that your blood cholesterol is high?

data.Label: Currently taking medicine for high cholesterol
data.Question: Are you currently taking medicine prescribed by your doctor or other health professional for your blood cholesterol?

data.Label: Ever Diagnosed with Heart Attack
data.Question_Prologue: Has a doctor, nurse, or other health professional ever told you that you had any of the following? For each, tell me “Yes”, “No”, or you’re “Not sure”
data.Question: (Ever told) you had a heart attack, also called a myocardial infarction?

data.Label: Ever Diagnosed with Angina or Coronary Heart Disease
data.Question: (Ever told) you had angina or coronary heart disease?

data.Label: Ever Diagnosed with a Stroke
data.Question: (Ever told) you had a stroke.

data.Label: Ever Told Had Asthma
data.Question: (Ever told) you had asthma?

data.Label: Still Have Asthma
data.Question: Do you still have asthma?

data.Label: (Ever told) you had skin cancer?
data.Question: (Ever told) you had skin cancer?

data.Label: (Ever told) you had any other types of cancer?
data.Question: (Ever told) you had any other types of cancer?

data.Label: (Ever told) (you had) chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, C.O.P.D., emphysema or chronic bronchitis?
data.Question: (Ever told) (you had) chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, C.O.P.D., emphysema or chronic bronchitis?

data.Label: (Ever told) you had a depressive disorder
data.Question: (Ever told) (you had) a depressive disorder (including depression, major depression, dysthymia, or minor depression)?

data.Label: Ever told you have kidney disease?
data.Question: Not including kidney stones, bladder infection or incontinence, were you ever told you had kidney disease?

data.Label: (Ever told) you had diabetes
data.Question: (Ever told) (you had) diabetes?  (If  ́Yes ́ and respondent is female, ask  ́Was this only when you were pregnant? ́. If Respondent says pre-diabetes or borderline diabetes, use response code 4.)

data.Label: Age When Told Had Diabetes
data.Question: How old were you when you were told you had diabetes?

data.Label: Told Had Arthritis
data.Question: (Ever told) (you had) some form of arthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, gout, lupus, or fibromyalgia?  (Arthritis diagnoses include

data.Label: Dr. Suggest Use of Physical Activity or Exercise for Arthritis or Joint Symptoms
data.Question: Has a doctor or other health professional ever suggested physical activity or exercise to help your arthritis or joint symptoms?  (If the respondent is unclear about whether this means an increase or decrease in physical activity, this means increase.)

data.Label: Ever Taken Class in Managing Arthritis or Joint Symptoms
data.Question: Have you ever taken an educational course or class to teach you how to manage problems related to your arthritis or joint symptoms?

data.Label: Limited Because of Joint Symptoms
data.Question: Are you now limited in any way in any of your usual activities because of arthritis or joint symptoms?

data.Label: Does Arthritis Affect Whether You Work
data.Question_Prologue: In this next question we are referring to work for pay.
data.Question: Do arthritis or joint symptoms now affect whether you work, the type of work you do or the amount of work you do?

data.Label: How Bad Was Joint Pain
data.Question_Prologue: Please think about the past 30 days, keeping in mind all of your joint pain or aching and whether or not you have taken medication.
data.Question: During the past 30 days, how bad was your joint pain on average on a scale of 0 to 10 where 0 is no pain and 10 is pain or aching as bad as it can be?

data.Label: Marital Status
data.Question: Are you

data.Label: Education Level
data.Question: What is the highest grade or year of school you completed?

data.Label: Own or Rent Home
data.Question: Do you own or rent your home?

data.Label: Household Telephones
data.Question: Not including cell phones or numbers used for computers, fax machines or security systems, do you have more than one telephone number in your household?

data.Label: Residential Phones
data.Question: How many of these telephone numbers are residential numbers?

data.Label: Do you have a cell phone for personal use?
data.Question: How many cell phones do you have for personal use?

data.Label: Are You A Veteran
data.Question: Have you ever served on active duty in the United States Armed Forces, either in the regular military or in a National Guard or military reserve unit?

data.Label: Employment Status
data.Question: Are you currently...?

data.Label: Number of Children in Household
data.Question: How many children less than 18 years of age live in your household?

data.Label: Income Level
data.Question: Is your annual household income from all sources

data.Label: Reported Weight in Pounds
data.Question: About how much do you weigh without shoes?  (If respondent answers in metrics, put a 9 in the first column)[Round fractions up.]

data.Label: Reported Height in Feet and Inches
data.Question: About how tall are you without shoes?  (If respondent answers in metrics, put a 9 in the first column)[Round fractions down.]

data.Label: Pregnancy Status
data.Question: To your knowledge, are you now pregnant?

data.Label: Are you deaf or do you have serious difficulty hearing?
data.Question: Are you deaf or do you have serious difficulty hearing?

data.Label: Blind or Difficulty seeing
data.Question: Are you blind or do you have serious difficulty seeing, even when wearing glasses?

data.Label: Difficulty Concentrating or Remembering
data.Question: Because of a physical, mental, or emotional condition, do you have serious difficulty concentrating, remembering, or making decisions?

data.Label: Difficulty Walking or Climbing Stairs
data.Question: Do you have serious difficulty walking or climbing stairs?

data.Label: Difficulty Dressing or Bathing
data.Question: Do you have difficulty dressing or bathing?

data.Label: Difficulty Doing Errands Alone
data.Question: Because of a physical, mental, or emotional condition, do you have difficulty doing errands alone such as visiting a doctor ́s office or shopping?

data.Label: Smoked at Least 100 Cigarettes
data.Question: Have you smoked at least 100 cigarettes in your entire life?   [Note

data.Label: Frequency of Days Now Smoking
data.Question: Do you now smoke cigarettes every day, some days, or not at all?

data.Label: Stopped Smoking in past 12 months
data.Question: During the past 12 months, have you stopped smoking for one day or longer because you were trying to quit smoking?

data.Label: Interval Since Last Smoked
data.Question: How long has it been since you last smoked a cigarette, even one or two puffs?

data.Label: Use of Smokeless Tobacco Products
data.Question: Do you currently use chewing tobacco, snuff, or snus every day, some days, or not at all?  (Snus (Swedish for snuff) is a moist smokeless tobacco, usually sold in small pouches that are placed under the lip against the gum.)[Snus (rhymes with  ́goose ́)]

data.Label: Days in past 30 had alcoholic beverage
data.Question: During the past 30 days, how many days per week or per month did you have at least one drink of any alcoholic beverage such as beer, wine, a malt beverage or liquor?

data.Label: Avg alcoholic drinks per day in past 30
data.Question: One drink is equivalent to a 12-ounce beer, a 5-ounce glass of wine, or a drink with one shot of liquor. During the past 30 days, on the days when you drank, about how many drinks did you drink on the average?  (A 40 ounce beer would count as 3 drinks, or a cocktail drink with 2 shots would count as 2 drinks.)

data.Label: Binge Drinking
data.Question: Considering all types of alcoholic beverages, how many times during the past 30 days did you have 5 or more drinks for men or 4 or more drinks for women on an occasion?

data.Label: Most drinks on single occasion past 30 days
data.Question: During the past 30 days, what is the largest number of drinks you had on any occasion?

data.Label: Exercise in Past 30 Days
data.Question: During the past month, other than your regular job, did you participate in any physical activities or exercises such as running, calisthenics, golf, gardening, or walking for exercise?

data.Label: Type of Physical Activity
data.Question: What type of physical activity or exercise did you spend the most time doing during the past month?

data.Label: How Many Times Walking, Running, Jogging, or Swimming
data.Question: How many times per week or per month did you take part in this activity during the past month?

data.Label: Minutes or Hours Walking, Running, Jogging, or Swimming
data.Question: And when you took part in this activity, for how many minutes or hours did you usually keep at it?

data.Label: Other Type of Physical Activity Giving Most Exercise During Past Month
data.Question: What other type of physical activity gave you the next most exercise during the past month?

data.Label: How Many Times Walking, Running, Jogging, or Swimming
data.Question: How many times per week or per month did you take part in this activity during the past month?

data.Label: Minutes or Hours Walking, Running, Jogging, or Swimming
data.Question: And when you took part in this activity, for how many minutes or hours did you usually keep at it?

data.Label: How many times did you do physical activities or exercises to STRENGTHEN your muscles?
data.Question: During the past month, how many times per week or per month did you do physical activities or exercises to STRENGTHEN your muscles?   [Do NOT count aerobic activities like walking, running, or bicycling. Count activities using your own body weight like yoga, sit-ups or push-ups and those using weight machines, free weights, or elastic bands.]

data.Label: How many times did you eat fruit?
data.Question: Not including juices, how often did you eat fruit?

data.Label: How many times did you drink 100 percent PURE fruit juices?
data.Question: Not including fruit-flavored drinks or fruit juices with added sugar, how often did you drink 100% fruit juice such as apple or orange juice?

data.Label: How many times did you eat dark green vegetables?
data.Question: How often did you eat a green leafy or lettuce salad, with or without other vegetables?

data.Label: How often do you eat french fries or fried potatoes?
data.Question: How often did you eat any kind of fried potatoes, including french fries, home fries, or hash browns?

data.Label: How Often Do You Eat Potatoes
data.Question: How often did you eat any other kind of potatoes, or sweet potatoes, such as baked, boiled, mashed potatoes, or potato salad?

data.Label: How many times did you eat OTHER vegetables?
data.Question: Not including lettuce salads and potatoes, how often did you eat other vegetables?

data.Label: Adult flu shot/spray past 12 mos
data.Question: During the past 12 months, have you had either flu vaccine that was sprayed in your nose or flu shot injected into your arm?

data.Label: When did you receive your most recent seasonal flu shot/spray?
data.Question: During what month and year did you receive your most recent flu vaccine that was sprayed in your nose or flu shot injected into your arm?

data.Label: Received Tetanus Shot Since 2005?
data.Question: Have you received a tetanus shot in the past 10 years?  (If yes, ask

data.Label: Pneumonia shot ever
data.Question: Have you ever had a pneumonia shot also known as a pneumococcal vaccine?

data.Label: Ever tested H.I.V.
data.Question: Including fluid testing from your mouth, but not including tests you may have had for blood donation, have you ever been tested for H.I.V?

data.Label: Month and Year of Last HIV Test
data.Question: Not including blood donations, in what month and year was your last H.I.V. test?  (If response is before January 1985, code  ́777777 ́.)

data.Label: Do Any High Risk Situations Apply
data.Question: I am going to read you a list. When I am done, please tell me if any of the situations apply to you. You do not need to tell me which one. You have injected any drug other than those prescribed for you in the past year. You have been treated for a sexually transmitted disease or STD in the past year.  You have given or received money or drugs in exchange for sex in the past year.

data.Label: Had a test for high blood sugar or diabetes in the past three years?
data.Question: Have you had a test for high blood sugar or diabetes within the past three years?

data.Label: Ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that you have pre-diabetes or borderline diabetes?
data.Question: Have you ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that you have pre-diabetes or borderline diabetes?  (If “Yes” and respondent is female, ask

data.Label: Now Taking Insulin
data.Question: Are you now taking insulin?

data.Label: How Often Check Blood for Glucose
data.Question: About how often do you check your blood for glucose or sugar?  [Include times when checked by a family member or friend, but do NOT include times when checked by a health professional.]

data.Label: How Often Check Feet for Sores or Irritations
data.Question: Including times when checked by a family member or friend, about how often do you check your feet for any sores or irritations?

data.Label: Times Seen Health Professional for Diabetes
data.Question: About how many times in the past 12 months have you seen a doctor, nurse, or other health professional for your diabetes?

data.Label: Times Checked for Glycosylated Hemoglobin
data.Question: About how many times in the past 12 months has a doctor, nurse, or other health professional checked you for A-one-C?

data.Label: Times Feet Check for Sores/irritations
data.Question: About how many times in the past 12 months has a health professional checked your feet for any sores or irritations?

data.Label: Last Eye Exam Where Pupils Were Dilated
data.Question: When was the last time you had an eye exam in which the pupils were dilated, making you temporarily sensitive to bright light?

data.Label: Ever Told Diabetes Has Affected Eyes
data.Question: Has a doctor ever told you that diabetes has affected your eyes or that you had retinopathy?

data.Label: Ever Taken Class in Managing Diabetes
data.Question: Have you ever taken a course or class in how to manage your diabetes yourself?

data.Label: Told had Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (CFS) or (Myalgic Encephalomyelitis) ME
data.Question: Have you ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that you had Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (CFS) or (Myalgic Encephalomyelitis) ME?

data.Label: Still have Chronic Fatigue Syndrome or Myalgic Encephalomyelitis
data.Question: Do you still have Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (CFS) or (Myalgic Encephalomyelitis) ME?

data.Label: How many hours a week are you been able to work
data.Question: Thinking about your CFS or ME, during the past 6 months, how many hours a week on average have you been able to work at a job or business for pay?

data.Label: Told had Hepatitis C
data.Question: Have you ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that you had Hepatitis C?

data.Label: Treated for Hepatitis C
data.Question: Were you treated for Hepatitis C in 2015 or after?

data.Label: Were you treated for Hepatitis C prior to 2015
data.Question: Were you treated for Hepatitis C prior to 2015?

data.Label: Still have Hepatitis C
data.Question: Do you still have Hepatitis C?

data.Label: Told  had hepatitis B
data.Question_Prologue: The next question is about Hepatitis B.
data.Question: Has a doctor, nurse, or other health professional ever told you that you had hepatitis B?

data.Label: Currently taking medicine for hepatitis B
data.Question: Are you currently taking medicine to treat hepatitis B?

data.Label: Have you ever had the HPV vaccination?
data.Question_Prologue: A vaccine to prevent the human papilloma virus or HPV infection is available and is called the cervical cancer or genital warts vaccine, HPV shot, [Fill
data.Question: Have you ever had the Human Papilloma virus vaccination or HPV vaccination?

data.Label: How many HPV shots did you receive?
data.Question: How many HPV shots did you receive?

data.Label: Where did you get your last flu shot/vaccine?
data.Question: At what kind of place did you get your last flu shot or vaccine?

data.Label: Have you ever had the shingles or zoster vaccine?
data.Question: Have you ever had the shingles or zoster vaccine?

data.Label: How old when you first started smoking?
data.Question: How old were you when you first started to smoke cigarettes regularly

data.Label: How old when you last smoked?
data.Question: How old were you when you last smoked cigarettes regularly?

data.Label: On average, how many cigarettes do you smoke each day?
data.Question: On average, when you {smoke/smoked} regularly, about how many cigarettes {do/did} you usually smoke each day?

data.Label: Did you have a CT or CAT scan?
data.Question: In the last 12 months, did you have a CT or CAT scan?

data.Label: Have You Ever Had a Mammogram
data.Question: Have you ever had a mammogram?

data.Label: How Long since Last Mammogram
data.Question: How long has it been since you had your last mammogram?

data.Label: Ever Had a Pap Test
data.Question: Have you ever had a Pap test?

data.Label: How Long Since Last Pap Test
data.Question: How long has it been since you had your last Pap test?

data.Label: Have you ever had an HPV test?
data.Question: An H.P.V. test is sometimes given with the Pap test for cervical cancer screening. Have you ever had an H.P.V. test?

data.Label: How long since your last HPV test?
data.Question: How long has it been since you had your last H.P.V. test?

data.Label: Had Hysterectomy
data.Question: Have you had a hysterectomy?  (A hysterectomy is an operation to remove the uterus (womb).)

data.Label: Has a health professional EVER talked with you about the advantages of the PSA test?
data.Question: Has a doctor, nurse, or other health professional ever talked with you about the advantages of the Prostate-Specific Antigen or P.S.A. test?

data.Label: Has a health professional EVER talked with you about the disadvantages of the PSA test?
data.Question: Has a doctor, nurse, or other health professional ever talked with you about the disadvantages of the PSA test?

data.Label: Has a doctor EVER recommended that you have a PSA test?
data.Question: Has a doctor, nurse, or other health professional ever recommended that you have a P.S.A. test?

data.Label: Ever Had PSA Test
data.Question: Have you ever had a P.S.A. test?

data.Label: Time Since Last PSA Test
data.Question: How long has it been since you had your last P.S.A. test?

data.Label: What was the MAIN reason you had this PSA test?
data.Question: What was the MAIN reason you had this P.S.A. test – was it ...?

data.Label: Why was PSA test done?
data.Question: Which of the following best describes the decision to have the P.S.A. test done?

data.Label: Who made the decision with you to have PSA test?
data.Question: Who made the decision with you?

data.Label: Ever Had Blood Stool Test Using Home Kit
data.Question: A blood stool test is a test that may use a special kit at home to determine whether the stool contains blood.  Have you ever had this test using a home kit?

data.Label: Time Since Last Blood Stool Test
data.Question: How long has it been since you had your last blood stool test using a home kit?

data.Label: Ever Had Sigmoidoscopy/Colonoscopy
data.Question: Sigmoidoscopy and colonoscopy are exams in which a tube is inserted in the rectum to view the colon for signs of cancer or other health problems. Have you ever had either of these exams?

data.Label: Was your last test a sigmoidoscopy or colonoscopy?
data.Question: For a sigmoidoscopy, a flexible tube is inserted into the rectum to look for problems. A colonoscopy is similar, but uses a longer tube, and you are usually given medication through a needle in your arm to make you sleepy and told to have someone else drive you home after the test. Was your most recent exam a sigmoidoscopy or a colonoscopy?

data.Label: Time Since Last Sigmoidoscopy/Colonoscopy
data.Question: How long has it been since you had your last sigmoidoscopy or colonoscopy?

data.Label: How Many Types of Cancer?
data.Question: How many different types of cancer have you had?

data.Label: Age Told Had Cancer
data.Question: At what age were you told that you had cancer?  (If Response = 2 (Two) or 3 (Three or more), ask

data.Label: Type of Cancer
data.Question: What type of cancer was it?  (If Response = 2 (Two) or 3 (Three or more), ask

data.Label: Currently Receiving Treatment for Cancer
data.Question: Are you currently receiving treatment for cancer?

data.Label: What Type of Doctor Provides Majority of Your Care
data.Question: What type of doctor provides the majority of your health care?

data.Label: Did You Receive a Summary of Cancer Treatments Received
data.Question: Did any doctor, nurse, or other health professional ever give you a written summary of all the cancer treatments that you received?

data.Label: Ever Receive Instructions From A Doctor For Follow-Up Check-Ups
data.Question: Have you ever received instructions from a doctor, nurse, or other health professional about where you should return or who you should see for routine cancer check-ups after completing treatment for cancer?

data.Label: Instructions Written or Printed
data.Question: Were these instructions written down or printed on paper for you?

data.Label: Did Health Insurance Pay For All Of Your Cancer Treatment
data.Question: With your most recent diagnosis of cancer, did you have health insurance that paid for all or part of your cancer treatment?  (“Health insurance” also includes Medicare, Medicaid, or other types of state health programs.)

data.Label: Ever Denied Insurance Coverage Because Of Your Cancer?
data.Question: Were you ever denied health insurance or life insurance coverage because of your cancer?

data.Label: Participate In Clinical Trial As Part Of Cancer Treatment?
data.Question: Did you participate in a clinical trial as part of your cancer treatment?

data.Label: Currently Have Physical Pain From Cancer Or Treatment?
data.Question: Do you currently have physical pain caused by your cancer or cancer treatment?

data.Label: Is Pain Under Control?
data.Question: Would you say your pain is currently under control...?

data.Label: Primary Health Insurance Coverage
data.Question: What is the primary source of your health care coverage? Is it...

data.Label: How often do you take an aspirin
data.Question: How often do you take an aspirin to prevent or control heart disease, heart attacks or stroke?  Would you say....

data.Label: Told check blood pressure at home
data.Question: Has your doctor nurse or other health professional recommended you check your blood pressure outside of the office or at home?

data.Label: Regularly check blood pressure at home
data.Question: Do you regularly check your blood pressure outside of your healthcare professional’s office or at home?

data.Label: Where do you get blood pressure taken
data.Question: Do you take it mostly at home or on a machine at a pharmacy, grocery or similar location?

data.Label: How do you share your blood pressure numbers
data.Question: How do you share your blood pressure numbers that you collected with your health professional? Is it mostly by telephone, other methods such as emails, internet portal or fax, or in person?

data.Label: Watching Sodium or Salt Intake
data.Question: Are you currently watching or reducing your sodium or salt intake?

data.Label: Doctor Advised Reduced Sodium/Salt Intake
data.Question: Has a doctor or other health professional ever advised you to reduce sodium or salt intake?

data.Label: Times used an indoor tanning device
data.Question: Not including spray-on tans, during the past 12 months, how many times have you used an indoor tanning device such as a sunlamp, tanning bed, or booth?

data.Label: Number Of Sunburns In Past 12 Months
data.Question: During the past 12 months, how many times have you had a sunburn?

data.Label: How often protect yourself from the sun
data.Question: When you go outside on a warm sunny day for more than one hour, how often do you protect yourself from the sun? Is that....

data.Label: How often outside on weekdays
data.Question: On weekdays, in the summer, how long are you outside per day between 10am and 4pm?

data.Label: How often outside on weekends
data.Question: On weekends in the summer, how long are you outside each day between 10am and 4pm?

data.Label: Have you experienced confusion or memory loss that is happening more often or is getting worse?
data.Question: During the past 12 months, have you experienced confusion or memory loss that is happening more often or is getting worse?

data.Label: Given up day-to-day chores due to confusion or memory loss
data.Question: During the past 12 months, as a result of confusion or memory loss, how often have you given up day-to-day household activities or chores you used to do, such as cooking, cleaning, taking medications, driving, or paying bills?

data.Label: Need assistance with day-to_day activities due to confusion or memory loss
data.Question: As a result of confusion or memory loss, how often do you need assistance with these day-to-day activities?

data.Label: When you need help with day-to-day activities are you able to get it
data.Question: When you need help with these day-to-day activities, how often are you able to get the help that you need?

data.Label: Does confusion or memory loss interfere with work or social activities
data.Question: During the past 12 months, how often has confusion or memory loss interfered with your ability to work, volunteer, or engage in social activities outside the home?

data.Label: Have you discussed your confusion or memory loss with a health care professional?
data.Question: Have you or anyone else discussed your confusion or memory loss with a health care professional?

data.Label: Provided regular care for family or friend
data.Question: During the past 30 days, did you provide regular care or assistance to a friend or family member who has a health problem or disability?

data.Label: Relationship Of Person To Whom You Are Giving Care?
data.Question: What is his/her relationship to you?

data.Label: How Long Provided Care For Person.
data.Question: For how long have you provided care for that person?

data.Label: How Many Hours Do You Provide Care For Person?
data.Question: In an average week, how many hours do you provide care or assistance?

data.Label: What Is The Major Health Problem, Illness, Disability For Care For Person?
data.Question: What is the main health problem, long-term illness, or disability that the person you care for has?

data.Label: Does Person Being Cared For Have Alzheimer ́s Disease?
data.Question: Does the person you care for also have Alzheimer ́s disease, dementia or other cognitive impairment disorder?

data.Label: Managed personal care
data.Question: In the past 30 days, did you provide care for this person by managing personal care such as giving medications, feeding, dressing, or bathing?

data.Label: Managed household tasks
data.Question: In the past 30 days, did you provide care for this person by managing household tasks such as cleaning, managing money, or preparing meals?

data.Label: Do you expect to have a relative you will need to provide care for?
data.Question: In the next 2 years, do you expect to provide care or assistance to a friend or family member who has a health problem or disability?

data.Label: Live With Anyone Depressed, Mentally Ill, Or Suicidal?
data.Question: Did you live with anyone who was depressed, mentally ill, or suicidal?

data.Label: Live With a Problem Drinker/Alcoholic?
data.Question: Did you live with anyone who was a problem drinker or alcoholic?

data.Label: Live With Anyone Who Used Illegal Drugs or Abused Prescriptions?
data.Question: Did you live with anyone who used illegal street drugs or who abused prescription medications?

data.Label: Live With Anyone Who Served TIme in Prison or Jail?
data.Question: Did you live with anyone who served time or was sentenced to serve time in a prison, jail, or other correctional facility?

data.Label: Were Your Parents Divorced/Seperated?
data.Question: Were your parents separated or divorced?

data.Label: How Often Did Your Parents Beat Each Other Up?
data.Question: How often did your parents or adults in your home ever slap, hit, kick, punch or beat each other up?

data.Label: How Often Did A Parent Physically Hurt You In Any Way?
data.Question: Not including spanking, (before age 18), how often did a parent or adult in your home ever hit, beat, kick, or physically hurt you in any way? Was it—

data.Label: How Often Did A Parent Swear At You?
data.Question: How often did a parent or adult in your home ever swear at you, insult you, or put you down?

data.Label: How Often Did Anyone Ever Touch You Sexually?
data.Question: How often did anyone at least 5 years older than you or an adult, ever touch you sexually?

data.Label: How Often Did Anyone Make You Touch Them Sexually?
data.Question: How often did anyone at least 5 years older than you or an adult, try to make you touch them sexually?

data.Label: How Often Did Anyone Ever Force You to Have Sex?
data.Question: How often did anyone at least 5 years older than you or an adult, force you to have sex?

data.Label: Did you do anything to keep from getting pregnant?
data.Question: The last time you had sex with a man, did you or your partner do anything to keep you from getting pregnant?

data.Label: What did you do to keep you from getting pregnant?
data.Question: The last time you had sex with a man, what did you or your partner do to keep you from getting pregnant?

data.Label: What was main reason for not doing anything to keep you from getting pregnant?
data.Question: What was your main reason for not using a method to prevent pregnancy the last time you had sex with a man?

data.Label: Asked during checkup if you drink alchohol
data.Question: You told me earlier that your last routine checkup was [within the past year/within the past 2 years]. At that checkup, were you asked in person or on a form if you drink alcohol?

data.Label: Asked in person or by form how much you drink?
data.Question: Did the health care provider ask you in person or on a form how much you drink?

data.Label: Asked whether you drank [5 FOR MEN /4 FOR WOMEN] or more alcoholic drinks on an occasion?
data.Question: Did the healthcare provider specifically ask whether you drank [5 FOR MEN /4 FOR WOMEN] or more alcoholic drinks on an occasion?

data.Label: Offered advice about what level of drinking is harmful or risky?
data.Question: Were you offered advice about what level of drinking is harmful or risky for your health?

data.Label: Were you advised to reduce or quit your drinking?
data.Question_Prologue: Healthcare providers may also advise patients to drink less for various reasons.
data.Question: At your last routine checkup, were you advised to reduce or quit your drinking?

data.Label: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you use marijuana or hashish?
data.Question: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you use marijuana or cannabis?

data.Label: During the past 30 days, how did you primarily use marijuana?
data.Question: During the past 30 days, which one of the following ways did you use marijuana the most often? Did you usually...   [Please select one. Did you...]

data.Label: What was the reason you used marijuana?
data.Question: When you used marijuana or cannabis during the past 30 days, was it usually

data.Label: In the past 12 months have you received food stamps
data.Question: In the past 12 months, have you received food stamps, also called SNAP, the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program on an EBT card?

data.Label: Are you male or female?
data.Question: What was your sex at birth? Was it male or female?

data.Label: Sexual orientation
data.Question: Which of the following best represents how you think of yourself?

data.Label: Sexual orientation
data.Question: Which of the following best represents how you think of yourself?

data.Label: Do you consider yourself to be transgender?
data.Question: Do you consider yourself to be transgender?  (If yes, ask “Do you consider yourself to be male-to-female, female-to-male, or gender non-conforming?)

data.Label: Gender of child
data.Question: Is the child a boy or a girl?

data.Label: Relationship to child
data.Question: How are you related to the child?

data.Label: Hlth pro ever said child has asthma
data.Question: Has a doctor, nurse or other health professional EVER said that the child has asthma?

data.Label: Child still have asthma?
data.Question: Does the child still have asthma?

data.Label: Stratum weight
data.Question: Stratum weight  (Number of records in a stratum (NRECSTR) divided by the number of records selected (NRECSEL).)

data.Label: Raw weighting factor used in raking
data.Question: Raw weighting factor used in raking  (Number of adults in the household (NUMADULT, maximum of 5) divided by the imputed number of phones (_IMPNPH, maximum of 3).)

data.Label: Design weight use in raking
data.Question: Design weight used in raking  (Stratum weight (_STRWT) multiplied by the raw weighting factor (_RAWRAKE).)

data.Label: Imputed race/ethnicity value
data.Question: Imputed race/ethnicity value  (This value is the reported race/ethnicity or an imputed race/ethnicity, if the respondent refused to give a race/ethnicity. The value of the imputed race/ethnicity will be the most common race/ethnicity response for that region of the state)
